original_text: The people in the city do not respect their parents. They have been cruel to the foreigners who live among you. They have cheated widows and children who have no family.
korean_text: 그들이 네 가운데에서 부모를 업신여겼으며 네 가운데에서 나그네를 학대하였으며 네 가운데에서 고아와 과부를 해하였도다

sentences.original_text: The people in the city do not respect their parents
They have been cruel to the foreigners
and children who have no family
